issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Disable windows wheel testing for python 3.6
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14424](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14424). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Two layers of the official python 3.6 windows image are not available for download.
Docker pull returns with unexpected status resolving reader: 403 Forbidden.

While this is a transient error, it blocks the release process.

See build log https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/3967178530?check_suite_focus=true#step:8:368

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14424?focusedCommentId=17432673) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11510
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11510>
